title: Emerald & Diamond Chakra Studs - Pachala Vairala Buggalu
materials: G Color). Hyderabadi Polish for enduring luster.
features: Intricate openwork filigree design inspired by the Chakra symbol. The central Emerald Cabochon is surrounded by a halo of sparkling diamonds. Delicate floral motifs intertwine within the circular frame, adding a touch of elegance. The design allows light to pass through, maximizing brilliance and sparkle.
colors: and dazzling white diamonds create a harmonious and luxurious color palette.
occasions: Perfect for festive occasions like Diwali
as well as formal events and everyday wear. Suitable for a bride's trousseau or as a meaningful gift for a loved one.
description: These Chakra studs combine modern design aesthetics with traditional South Indian craftsmanship. The Emerald, revered for its association with wisdom and growth, is perfectly complemented by the brilliance of diamonds. The comfortable stud design ensures easy wearability. A valuable addition to any jewelry collection.
